entries.description: Apply formatText to readerHighlightedText for consistent markdown rendering
Remove yellow background from Meilisearch em tags, simplify reader highlighting
Add left margin to source text for paragraph number spacing
Add floating paragraph numbers to reader and hit cards
Use text-primary at 50% opacity for version, ensure update button is full opacity
Use --text-secondary for version without opacity for readability
Use text-secondary color for version, remove opacity
Increase version text opacity from 0.6 to 0.8 for readability
Show just 'UPDATE' on update button, no version
Use Tailwind for PWA toast, simplify to UPDATE button only
